text: Mario de Sárraga (born 22 August 1980, in Oviedo) is a former Spanish cyclist. ==Palmarès== ;2003 :1st Gran Premio Cuéllar - Clásica de la Chuleta :1st Memorial Cirilo Zunzarren :1st GP Virgen del Cristo- Palencia ;2004 :1st Coppa Sportivi Malvesi :1st Trofeo Edilizia Mogetta ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Mario de Sárraga
